me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore.command

Class BotCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore.command.BotCommand

  • public abstract class BotCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    A command that can be executed by the bot. It will automatically be parsed by the MessageHandler and the execute(Message, String, ArrayList, FlagSet) method will be called. Must be registered to the MessageHandler using MessageHandler.registerCommand(BotCommand) before the command can be used.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message msg,
                             java.lang.String alias,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args,
                             FlagSet flags)
        Method that gets called when a message comes from a user that both starts with the command prefix + name OR any aliases and The sender has the correct permission to use this command.
        Parameters:
        msg - - Discord message instance.
        alias - - Alias used to execute the command.
        args - - List of arguments separated by spaces (Excluding flags and their parameters).
        flags - - List of CommandFlag which were parsed out of the command.

      • setPermission

        @Deprecated
public void setPermission(net.dv8tion.jda.core.Permission permission)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the Discord Permission a sender of a command must have to execute this command
        Parameters:
        permission - - New Permission to require.

      • setHelpInfo

        public void setHelpInfo(java.lang.String description,
                        java.lang.String usage)
        Populates the description and usage. Can be used by help commands.
        Parameters:
        description - - Description of the command.
        usage - - Usage of the command including possible arguments.

      • setAliases

        public void setAliases(java.lang.String... alises)
        Sets aliases that the command can use in substitution of the name. The name of the command has higher priority than an alias.
        Parameters:
        alises - - An array of aliases to use.

      • registerFlag

        public void registerFlag(java.lang.String tag,
                         int parameters)
        Adds a CommandFlag to this command. A flag must be registered in order to be parsed properly by the MessageHandler.
        Parameters:
        tag - - Name of the flag to add.
        parameters - - Required number of parameters for this flag.

      • registerFlag

        public void registerFlag(java.lang.String tag,
                         int parameters,
                         java.lang.String description)
        Adds a CommandFlag to this command. A flag must be registered in order to be parsed properly by the MessageHandler.
        Parameters:
        tag - - Name of the flag to add.
        parameters - - Required number of parameters for this flag.
        description - - Description to be listed in a help command.

      • registerFlag

        public void registerFlag(java.lang.String tag,
                         int parameters,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String usage)
        Adds a CommandFlag to this command. A flag must be registered in order to be parsed properly by the MessageHandler.
        Parameters:
        tag - - Name of the flag to add.
        parameters - - Required number of parameters for this flag.
        description - - Description to be listed in a help command.
        usage - - Usage information to be listed in a help command.
